website_summaries.verdict: Another addition to the growing lineup of DVS sneakers is the DVS Rico CT skate shoes. It is a low-top, low profile skate shoe with a deconstructed upper in different materials for form-fitting comfort, a vulcanized outsole with Flex Fit technology for optimum grip and board feel, and an EVA footbed for added cushioned comfort and support.With a classic skate appeal, modern comfort, and performance, this skate shoe model from the DVS Heritage Skate Shoes collection is here to deliver at an affordable price tag.
pros: Lots of reviewers agree that the DVS Rico CT skate shoes are comfortable on foot
Several reviewers claim that they are highly satisfied with the overall performance of this shoe
The budget-friendly price of this DVS shoe pleases a couple of purchasers
A couple of reviewers highlight that the vulcanized outsole of the DVS Rico CT is flexible and offers excellent board feel
This shoe fits great, according to heaps of commenters
Some users report that the Rico CT from the DVS Heritage Skate shoes is quality-made
cons: The colorways presented for the DVS Rico CT are limited

customer_reviews.title: Scuffed out of the box
customer_reviews.text: Ordered the camo ripstop (which I already have and wanted a new pair because i really liked them), received the black ones with cadence sole (that wasn't even an option on amazon's listing). Wouldn't really have cared if it wasn't for the gum around the sole being scuffed up out of the box. Not worth the return shipping, I guess I'll just trash them up so they look right.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Decent shoes.
customer_reviews.text: I bought them for work, they're not extremely comfortable but after they got broken in they were bearable. They have held together extremely well and have yet to wear on the soles, and I work on my feet 8 hours a day. They have very little support, so do not get them if you intend on being on your feet for hours on end.
customer_reviews.author: Danny Wiser

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic sneakers. Have a stiffer sole shank for comfort on long rides.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin F. Ward

customer_reviews.title: I've only had these shoes for two months and they're ...
customer_reviews.text: I've only had these shoes for two months and they're starting to fall apart. The top of the shoe is a very thin fabric, and my big toe is scraping a hole through the fabric. The edge of the shoe is also starting to come unglued. Other than that, can't complain, but I have bought shoes in this price range before that have lasted much longer.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: My big toe wore a hole in the top fabric after a couple months
customer_reviews.author: Logan Dirks

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty shoes but uncomfortable when walking
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are beautiful but abused feet, I've used them a couple of times and have caused me blisters on your heels, they should have a protector on the back that would protect the heels
customer_reviews.author: Dario Carrillo Blanco

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: I can't really rate these shoes as they were too small. I did order a larger size but have not received them yet. This not necessarily the manufacturers fault since I didn't realize how much my grandson's feet had grown.
customer_reviews.author: M. Fleck

customer_reviews.title: Just great
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son and he loves them The fitting is as expected and the style great for his casual wear
customer_reviews.author: serowa

customer_reviews.title: These shoes are cheap for a reason.
customer_reviews.text: These things were not designed for human feet. The sole is very thin, yet somehow extremely rigid, and the fabric on top is about as thick as that mesh t-shirt from the "I'm Too Sexy" video. It's kind of like walking around in wooden sandals: cool for feudal Japan, not so much today.
customer_reviews.author: iminlovewiththecoco

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable for the summer. I wore these nearly every day on vacation..walked miles..
customer_reviews.author: oresto

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: not the most durable shoe but its comfortable looks good and.. yeah
customer_reviews.author: jimaboi

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes
customer_reviews.text: DVS shoes seem to last long and fit comfortable. Seem to be wider than vans and I need that.
customer_reviews.author: cottoncandyhigh

customer_reviews.title: Skate shoes with modest look
customer_reviews.text: I needed skate shoes that don't stick out with their white soles when going to office / meeting a client. I had these shoes before and had no problems with them. Maybe the soles wore a bit sooner than on some other skate shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Miklos Biro

customer_reviews.title: Sweet, dude.
customer_reviews.text: I love them so much. They are awesome. They haven't even started falling apart like most other low cost shoes do.
customer_reviews.author: Dakota W.

customer_reviews.title: Good shoe just way to big
customer_reviews.text: Its a good shoe looks amazing just the size is very big and i have to wear many pairs of socks for the proper fit and that gets a little annoying when wakeskating and having 3 pairs of wet socks
customer_reviews.author: michael

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Pretty comfortable and seem to be good quality so far
customer_reviews.author: Dustin D

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not greatest shoe out there,but is def great for the price I got it at..
customer_reviews.author: Junior Diaz

customer_reviews.title: but like the look of these online
customer_reviews.text: I don't usually go with skate shoes, but like the look of these online. Didn't fit well and barely wore them.
customer_reviews.author: Loyola Law Student

customer_reviews.title: Amazing shoes, very light in the water
customer_reviews.text: Amazing shoes, very light in the water. I bought them for wake skating and they work better than any shoe I've seen or used. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: for a pair of DVS's price was super cheap, really comfortable and they look freaking amazing
customer_reviews.text: for a pair of DVS's price was super cheap, really comfortable and they look freaking amazing. Love Shoebacca.... Nice buy!
customer_reviews.author: benjamin perez

customer_reviews.title: Good forma skating so far
customer_reviews.text: Awesome. Just as expected. I'll see how much skating they can handle.
customer_reviews.author: Bernardo

customer_reviews.title: Chemically Unstable
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable shoes. Almost made of a Spandex type material so very form fitting and breathable. The gripe I have with them is that the shoes make my feet burn (as in chemically). I'm not sure if it was a certain glue used on them or what exactly the deal is but they actually chemically burned the bottoms of my feet. I actually even changed out the inserts but over a period of about a month it started again. No other shoes I wear or have worn had this effect on me (no, I'm not crazy). Is there a lawsuit there...? Avoid unless you have desires of being an amputee.
customer_reviews.author: AbracadabrA

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: finally got them after mix up with mail carrier , but worth the wait
customer_reviews.author: alex vig

customer_reviews.title: Love the shoes
customer_reviews.text: Love the shoes so much so I order a second pair. Very comfortable and lightweight
customer_reviews.author: Tim Stewart

customer_reviews.text: i got the box that said 9 on the out side but when i tried to but them on they didn't fit...they were 6.5 .... very disappointing
customer_reviews.author: Juan Zamarron

customer_reviews.title: very good but came broken
customer_reviews.text: was a pity ... the left shoe had broken sewing them back ... or think that the time and cost for shipping was going to take much, other than the time does not correspond to my country. however I will not use because you can not waste something ... hopefully for the next few purchases I have more consideration to products
customer_reviews.author: Andres

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my boyfriend and he absolutely loves them. He skates them and says he can run in them too. They look and fit him great.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Mayhall

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice shoe.. Fits as expected. Get plenty of compliments on them!
customer_reviews.author: Elijah Flores

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Got to say good quality extremely comfortable I would recommend the sneakers to anyone I'm definetly gonna get a couple more pairs
customer_reviews.author: Ghost

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice shoes. Since the top is mesh like they breath very easy.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony M

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: A little bit smaller than another DVS rico i have, but everything ok!
customer_reviews.author: Manuel

customer_reviews.title: yeah!
customer_reviews.text: these are the best shoes i ever bought hands down =) i will be wearing them for a long time i can already tell
customer_reviews.author: josh banko

customer_reviews.title: But the shoes are alright
customer_reviews.text: I didn't get the shoes I ordered I got some other pair of shoes I was really hoping I got the shoes I ordered
customer_reviews.author: Erin Guerrero

customer_reviews.title: Nice Shoe!
customer_reviews.text: Definitely a nice comfortable shoe. I love the mesh material its made from, very breathable and comfy. Wouldnt recomend them for skateboarding though the soles seem a little soft and easy to wear down. If youre looking for a skate shoe I recommend vans but if youre looking for agood looking cheap comfortable shoe this is a great choice. They do come with the green laces shown as well as gray laces.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen

product_meta.title: DVS Men's Rico CT STS Skate Shoe,Grey Mesh/H2O,6 M US
feature_bullets: Classic and minimally padded, this is a performance-ready skate shoe.
